title: Is it fine skip first few days of bootstrap
content: Hey, due to reasons i might not be able to attend first few days of this week. Will I be missing anything important?

comments.body: I don't think you'll be missing anything serious. Bootstrap is like an introduction, and is a good place to start meeting new people. You should be fine if you miss it

Nope none at all.

I skipped the entire week by playing fortnite(it was a hot game during 2019).

I manged to complete 3 years and the 4th one running.

No academic stuff was done.
The one on design thinking sucks. We made a "startup" for a web site on cardboard. Learnt stuff you could learn in 15 minutes for 6 literal hours.
